# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. La Paz Press April 16 reports, without elaboration, that Bolivian Adolfo Linares will remain as president of Andean Development Corporation (CAF) until 1975. GOB official tells US that Integration Secretariat also receiving conflicting report about Linares' intentions. He added that Linares has stated desire to return to Bolivia.
2. Suggest that Department delay letter suggested reftel. Stedman
